title: Cooked Wings
description:
Swagu and Perk are back and they discuss the Kyrie Irving and Kevin Durant drama in Brooklyn, call out Draymond Green for being a false new media prophet, show love to Lamar Jackson for handling his business his way, and debate whether Charles Barkley was right for saying Kevin Durant wasn't a bus driver for the Warriors. All that and more! For tickets for the live show in Houston, Texas click here: bit.ly/swaguperk22
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Marcus Spears, Kendrick Perkins
